text: We ate last week at Thai Zone when we were visiting Quebec City on the weekend. It is a fast food place, the food was pretty good, we ordered the Pad Thai, Red Curry, General Tao chicken. We enjoyed our food .

This is the worst food I've ever had I asked for general Tao and instead I got chicken with pineapple and egg I didn't even ask for it and everything was burnt including the rice it was disgusting I spent 25.98$ for two people and didn't even get what I asked for this is the last time I go.

Étant une grande fervente du Thai Express, je devais essayer ce restaurant. Je n'ai rien a dire du personnel, tres sympathique et accueillant, par contre pour ce qui est de la nourriture j'ai ete plutot decu.  En comparaison avec le Thai Express, je trouve que les mets, en reference avec ce que nous avons essayé; Riz Frit et Pad Thai, ca avaient beaucoup moins de gouts et de saveurs. Cependant beaucoup moins huileux qu'au Thai Express. En general, meme principe et meme plat qu'au Thai Express.
Worst thai fast food ever ! Tried it twice few years ago when they first opened havent and will never go back!
